amendment.description: To provide for the stationing of C-130 H aircraft avionics previously modified by the Avionics Modernization Program (AMP) in support of daily training and contingency requirements for Airborne and Special Operations Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1506 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 44. Record Vote Number: 204.

action.text: Amendment SA 1506 proposed by Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3666-3667; text: CR S3666-3667) To provide for the stationing of C-130 H aircraft avionics previously modified by the Avionics Modernization Program (AMP) in support of daily training and contingency requirements for Airborne and Special Operations Forces.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1506 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 44. Record Vote Number: 204.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1506 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 44. Record Vote Number: 204.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1506 proposed by Senator Tillis to Amendment SA 1463.
